creator: Ness Corporation
descriptionHtml:
MEZZO Guardian combines Z-Wave and IP technologies to provide a seamless security, automation, energy management, intercom, CCTV and medical solution into one wireless unit. The system is controlled by our MEZZO Guardian App via 3G and a dedicated WiFi router as well as having integrated intelligence that gives you instant control, anytime, anywhere.

Main features:

- My Health feature helps to send alert to emergency contacts. Medical alert can be sent as SMS with your location to emergency contacts or as push notification to Mezzo users. Also My Health helps to take your medicine on time.
descriptionShort: The companion app to the Mezzo Guardian system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Bug fixing

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Supported new actions and conditions:
audio action - read/write
start/stop actions - read
set timer action - read
timer expired condition - read
timer timeout condition - read
multichannel condition - read/write
zwave changed condition - read/write
Support timers
Fixed some bugs

- Fixed bugs

- My Health feature helps to send alert to emergency contacts. Medical alert can be sent as SMS with your location to emergency contacts or as push notification to Mezzo users. Also My Health helps to take your medicine on time.
descriptionShort: The companion app to the Mezzo Guardian system.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved geofences initial trigger
- Improved timers. Time duration limit is removed
- Improved zWave devices control button deadzone
